texts.LINGYUN.Abp.Message:01400: Sending the message failed: The message is incomplete!
texts.LINGYUN.Abp.Message:01401: You have not joined the group and cannot operate!

texts.LINGYUN.Abp.Message:02400: The administrator has turned on silence mode!
texts.LINGYUN.Abp.Message:02403: The administrator has banned you from speaking!
texts.LINGYUN.Abp.Message:02401: The administrator does not allow anonymous speaking!
texts.LINGYUN.Abp.Message:02404: Sending the message failed: the group does not exist or is disbanded!

texts.LINGYUN.Abp.Message:03302: You need to verify the problem to add friends
texts.LINGYUN.Abp.Message:03400: The user has rejected all messages!
texts.LINGYUN.Abp.Message:03401: The user rejects the message you sent!
texts.LINGYUN.Abp.Message:03402: Users do not receive anonymous comments!

texts.LINGYUN.Abp.Message:03411: The other party is already your friend or has sent an authentication request. The operation cannot be repeated!
texts.Notifications:RequestAddNewFriend: User {name} has requested that you be added as a friend
texts.Messages:NewFriend: I have added you as a friend, let's chat together!
